Talents.Name: Gang Spirit
Talents.Description: Has a 30% chance of increasing ATK to 150% when attacking. When deployed, this multiplier increases by +5% for every enemy defeated within the 4 adjacent tiles of a [Glasgow Gang] Operator (max 240%)

Talents.Name: Knight's Honor
Talents.Description: In [Return to Mist], HP +20%, and each attack restores HP equal to 20% of damage dealt
